title: Data (Use and Access) Act 2025
summary: An Act to make provision about access to customer data and business data; to regulate the processing and sharing of information relating to identifiable individuals; to establish the Information Commission; to make provision about privacy, electronic communications, copyright-protected works, and the development of artificial intelligence systems; and for connected purposes.

title: The National Security and Investment Act 2021 (Notifiable Acquisition) (Specification of Qualifying Entities) Regulations 2021
summary: These Regulations specify descriptions of qualifying entities for the purposes of mandatory notification under the National Security and Investment Act 2021.

title: Directive (EU) 2019/1024 on open data and the re-use of public sector information
summary: Directive governing access to and re-use of public sector information across the European Union.
ai_relevance: Establishes rules on access to and re-use of public sector data, which may be used as input for artificial intelligence systems.

title: Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council (UK GDPR)
summary: This Regulation governs the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data, including provisions on automated processing and automated decision-making.
relevance_to_automation: Includes provisions related to automated processing and automated decision-making involving personal data.
relevance_to_ai: Addresses automated processing and automated decision-making, which may include artificial intelligence systems that process personal data.

title: The Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018 (Commencement No. 1) Regulations 2021
summary: These Regulations bring into force provisions of the Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018, including sections establishing a legal framework for identifying and regulating automated vehicles.
relevance_to_automation: Brings into force statutory provisions related to the identification and regulation of automated vehicles.
relevance_to_ai: Establishes a legal framework concerning automated vehicles; artificial intelligence relevance is not explicitly specified.

title: The Sheep Carcase (Classification and Price Reporting) (Scotland) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations mandate classification and price reporting of sheep carcases, including provisions that specifically regulate automated classification methods.
relevance_to_automation: Includes provisions regulating the use of automated classification methods for sheep carcases.
relevance_to_ai: Automated classification methods are referenced; relevance to artificial intelligence is not explicitly specified.

title: The Sheep Carcase (Classification and Price Reporting) (England) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations require mandatory classification and price reporting of sheep carcases by approved slaughterhouses, including regulated classification systems.
relevance_to_automation: Regulated classification systems are referenced; automation is not explicitly specified.
relevance_to_ai: Artificial intelligence is not specified.

title: The Sheep Carcass (Classification and Price Reporting) (Wales) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations mandate classification and price reporting of sheep carcasses by larger slaughterhouses, including classification mechanisms.
relevance_to_automation: Classification mechanisms are referenced; automation is not explicitly specified.
relevance_to_ai: Artificial intelligence is not specified.

title: Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/683
summary: This Regulation establishes administrative and market surveillance requirements for motor vehicles and related systems, including approval and compliance mechanisms.
relevance_to_ai: Artificial intelligence is not specified.

title: The Road Vehicles (Construction and Use) (Automated Vehicles) Order 2022
summary: This Order modifies vehicle construction and use rules to permit visual displays when a vehicle is operating in automated mode under the Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018.
relevance_to_automation: Permits specific vehicle features when operating in automated mode under an automated vehicle legal framework.
relevance_to_ai: Artificial intelligence is not specified.

title: Data Protection Act 2018
summary: This Act regulates the processing of personal data, including provisions governing automated decision-making and profiling.
relevance_to_automation: Includes provisions governing automated decision-making and profiling in the context of personal data processing.
relevance_to_ai: Addresses automated decision-making and profiling, which may involve artificial intelligence systems processing personal data.

title: The Automated Vehicles Act 2024 (Commencement No. 1) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations bring into force specified provisions of the Automated Vehicles Act 2024, establishing the legal framework for automated vehicles.
relevance_to_automation: Brings into force statutory provisions establishing a legal framework for automated vehicles.
relevance_to_ai: Artificial intelligence is not specified.

title: The Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018 (Commencement No. 2) Regulations 2022
summary: These Regulations bring into force additional provisions of the Automated and Electric Vehicles Act 2018, extending the regulatory framework for automated vehicles.
relevance_to_automation: Brings into force additional statutory provisions extending the regulatory framework for automated vehicles.
relevance_to_ai: Artificial intelligence is not specified.

title: The Sanctions (Miscellaneous Amendments) (Overseas Territories) Order 2025
summary: This Order amends the various Orders mentioned in article 2 (the Principal Orders).

title: Communications Act 2003
summary: An Act to confer functions on the Office of Communications and to regulate electronic communications networks and services, broadcasting, spectrum use, and related matters.
relevance_to_digital: Regulates electronic communications networks and services and related digital communications activities.

title: Digital Markets, Competition and Consumers Act 2024
summary: An Act to regulate competition in digital markets, amend competition law, strengthen consumer protections, and confer new powers on competition authorities.
relevance_to_digital: Regulates competition and consumer protection in digital markets.

title: Enterprise Act 2002
summary: An Act establishing competition and market investigation powers, merger control, and enforcement mechanisms for fair trading and consumer protection.

title: The Small-scale Radio Multiplex and Community Digital Radio Order 2019
summary: This Order establishes regulatory frameworks for small-scale digital radio multiplex services and community digital radio broadcasting.
relevance_to_digital: Establishes regulatory frameworks for digital radio multiplex services and digital radio broadcasting.

title: The Television Multiplex Services (Reservation of Digital Capacity) Order 2008
summary: This Order enables the regulation and reorganisation of digital terrestrial television capacity to support new broadcasting technologies.
relevance_to_digital: Regulates digital terrestrial television capacity and supports digital broadcasting technologies.

title: The Local Digital Television Programme Services Order 2012
summary: This Order modifies broadcasting legislation to enable and regulate local digital television programme services in the UK.
relevance_to_digital: Enables and regulates local digital television programme services.

title: The Income Tax (Digital Requirements) Regulations 2021
summary: These Regulations introduce digital record-keeping and reporting requirements for income tax purposes.
relevance_to_digital: Introduces digital record-keeping and reporting requirements for income tax purposes.

title: The Representation of the People (Electronic Communications and Amendment) (Northern Ireland) Regulations 2018
summary: These Regulations amend electoral registration processes to permit the use of electronic communications in Northern Ireland.
relevance_to_digital: Permits the use of electronic communications in electoral registration processes.

title: The Land Register of Scotland (Automated Registration) etc. Regulations 2014
summary: These Regulations enable automated and electronic land registration processes in Scotland.
relevance_to_digital: Enables automated and electronic land registration processes.

title: The Financial Services and Markets Act 2023 (Digital Securities Sandbox) Regulations 2023
summary: These Regulations establish a digital securities sandbox allowing the testing of developing technologies in financial market infrastructure activities under the Financial Services and Markets Act 2023.
relevance_to_digital: Establishes a digital securities sandbox for testing developing technologies in financial market infrastructure activities.

summary: These Regulations bring into force provisions in the Levelling-up and Regeneration Act 2023 (“the 2023 Act”) and the Planning and Infrastructure Act 2025 (“the 2025 Act”).

title: The Morecambe Offshore Windfarm Generation Assets Order 2025
summary: This Order grants development consent for, and authorises the construction, operation and maintenance of, an offshore wind farm generating station located approximately 30 kilometres from the Lancashire coast of England, together with associated development. This Order imposes requirements in connection with the development.

title: The Online Safety Act 2023 (Priority Offences) (Amendment) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations amend the priority offences set out in Schedule 7 to the Online Safety Act 2023 (c. 50) (“the Act”). Criminal offences listed in Schedule 7 to the Act are made ‘priority offences’ by section 59(7)(c) of the Act. Part 3 of the Act imposes duties on providers of certain internet services in relation to priority offences and content which amounts to these offences.
relevance_to_digital: Mentions digital systems, electronic services, automated processing, or information technology.

title: The Enterprise Act 2002 (Mergers Involving Newspaper Enterprises and Foreign Powers) (No. 2) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations amend the Enterprise Act 2002 (c. 40) (“the Act”) to create exceptions within the merger control regime in Chapter 3A of Part 3 of the Act, which prohibits foreign state newspaper merger situations. A foreign state newspaper merger situation is created where a merger involving a newspaper enterprise, which meets certain conditions as to turnover and share of supply, results in a foreign power being able to control or influence the policy of the person carrying on the newspaper enterprise, or being able to control or influence that policy to a greater extent.
relevance_to_digital: No explicit reference to digital systems.
relevance_to_data: No explicit reference to data governance.
relevance_to_ai: Mentions artificial intelligence or automated decision-making.

title: The Education (Scotland) Act 2025 (Consequential Provisions and Modifications) Order 2025
summary: This Order makes provision in consequence of the Education (Scotland) Act 2025 (“the 2025 Act”), which establishes Qualifications Scotland (in Gaelic, Teisteanasan Alba) and His Majesty’s Chief Inspector of Education in Scotland (in Gaelic, Àrd-Neach-sgrùdaidh an Rìgh airson Foghlam ann an Alba), and makes provision about their respective functions.
